short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to scroll to the Top or Bottom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your browsing experience with smooth and effortless scrolling. Instantly navigate to the top or bottom of any page, enjoying a seamless journey through online content.
